responsibilities: Develop innovative machine learning technology and products that serve millions of Snapchatters
Work on state of the art GenAI pipelines for image and video generation
Deliver generative machine learning experiences on device
Build cutting-edge augmented reality experiences using generative and diffusion models
Partner with cross-functional Snap teams to explore and prototype new products
category: Prompt Engineering and Large Language Models (LLMs)
activity: Fine-tuning and customization of language models
analysis: The job responsibilities focus on developing machine learning technology, working on GenAI pipelines, and building augmented reality experiences. While these tasks involve advanced machine learning techniques, there is no specific mention of language models or tasks that would require fine-tuning or customization of language models. The responsibilities seem more aligned with image and video generation rather than text-based language models.
